title: Trump Planning A Comeback? Zoom Induced Facelifts? 4.29.21
itunes:title: Trump Planning A Comeback? Zoom Induced Facelifts? 4.29.21
description:
In episode 898, Jack and Miles are joined by the Hot And Rich Show, This Podcast Is Self-Care, and JackAM's Cait Raft to discuss Republicans and their vaccine PR, Trump's rally plans, the Zoom effect, Joe Rogan and ethnical technology, Facebook's misinformation campaign, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. GOP Doctors’ Caucus Puts Out PSA Urging Constituents To Get COVID Vaccine
  2. Misinformation and flip-flopping from federal bureaucrats causing vaccine hesitancy
  3. 'Not an easy transition': Inside Trump's unconventional first months out of office
  4. US Plastic Surgeons Expect Boom in Procedures Below Zoom Line
  5. Joe Rogan spread anti-vaccine misinformation. Spotify's CEO is standing behind him
  6. Facebook’s A.I. Whiz Now Faces the Task of Cleaning It Up. Sometimes That Brings Him to Tears.
  7. How Facebook got addicted to spreading misinformation
  8. LISTEN: Born Jamericans • Send My Love

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
